Posts.Content: H everyone.....I was diognosed in May...I have had a lumpectomy.....clear margins and no nymph lodes involved... I have just had my 3rd FEC chemo.....I am really poorly when I have this and the sickness lasts for about 2 weeks... tried lots of different meds....nothing seems to work.... im thinking of stopping my treatment.....as I don't want to feel like this all if the time..... i was give a 6% more chance of surviving.....if I had chemo.....but I'm not sure it's worth it..... my next lot of chemo are 3 x T......but I'm told I won't feel sick..... anyone else stopped treatment half way through ????
Posts.Title: Sickness Durung Chemo FEC

Posts.Content: MY mouth is very much cardboard at the moment....I have no tastebuds at all.... I've been having soft food....scrambled egg.....weetabix...soup...trifle.etc.....but nothing tastes normal.... I did find sherbet lemons had a sort of taste.....plus the mouthwash provided by the hospital.... Hope this helps xx
Posts.Title: Sickness Durung Chemo FEC

Posts.Content: Thank you Lucylilly for you reply.... Sorry to hear you had a rough time on FEC.... I will continue with the treatment and see how I get on xx
Posts.Title: Sickness Durung Chemo FEC

Posts.Content: Thank you Londonlass fir your reply.... perhaps I am being a bit silly......I will carry on xx
Posts.Title: Sickness Durung Chemo FEC

Posts.Content: I had my first Docitaxel last Wednesday....I was fine for a few days....then the truck hit me.....I could not walk....the bone pain was excruciating.....I was rushed to hospital by ambulance yesterday where I spent all day....I'm now on Tramadol....which seems to be working for the pain.....I'm very weak....but I'm coping... Anyone else had this problem .?Â
Posts.Title: Truth about doxetaxel

Posts.Content: I also attend the Beacon centre...I have 2 more chemo treatments...then I start my radio therapy......I hope I get the same cream as you......if I do I will be a very happy lady.....thanks for the heads up xx
